div.head: 眼寒
div.div: cold eyeballs; the eyeballs are cold

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: cold eyeballs; the eyeballs are cold

sense.def: Pathological Condition of pain in the eyes, tearflow, and night blindness brought forth by wind and cold evil rising to the head and residing there. Su wen 素問 42: 風入系頭，則為目風眼 寒 , “When the wind enters the connection with the head, then this causes eye wind. The eyeballs are cold ”. Yan hei 眼黑 , darkened eyes [6]

Illness Sign identical with mu hei 目黑 . Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 4: 有二十三蒸，…九肝蒸，眼黑 , “There are 32 variants of steaming…The ninth is: liver steaming. [This is the case when] the eyes are darkened ”.
